description: Apps and systems that help me stay focused and efficient

body.name: Comet
body.description: My potential replacement for Arc. I'm trying this AI-native browser from Perplexity for its streamlined approach to research and browsing.

body.name: 1Password
body.description: My password manager for keeping all my logins secure. No more struggling to remember complex passwords!

body.name: Raycast
body.description: My powerful launcher for apps, workflows, and more to boost productivity - it saves me tons of time!

body.name: Notion
body.description: My all-in-one workspace for notes, tasks, projects, and wikis.

body.name: yabai
body.description: A tiling window manager for macOS for efficient screen organization.

body.name: Cloudflare
body.description: My platform of choice for deploying and hosting web applications with ease, along with a powerful CDN and DDoS protection.

body.name: Supabase
body.description: My backend-as-a-service solution for managing databases, user authentication, and more.
